author: bimsebasse
name: Nadia
description:
My shot at a Nadia theme, made and tested in Nadia. Comes in a light and a dark version.

Wallpaper
Mint 14 Cinnamon ("Numptious Nadia")

Updates
- Dec 19, 2012: Panel scaling fix (big up mtwebster)
- Dec 17, 2012: Improved Workspace OSD
- Dec 4, 2012: Better modal dialogs + dark theme slightler darker again
